name: oraclemcp
description: Oracle MCP Server - Provides access to Oracle databases with query execution, schema introspection, and AI-powered SQL optimization

tools.name: schemas
tools.description: Get schema information for specified tables including columns, constraints, and foreign keys

tools.name: query
tools.description: Execute SQL SELECT queries and return results

tools.name: execute_sql
tools.description: Execute SQL statements for INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE operations

tools.name: get_valid_languages
tools.description: Get valid language codes from LANGUES table

tools.name: list_user_tables_with_descriptions
tools.description: List all user tables and their functional descriptions

tools.name: get_sql_optimization_rules
tools.description: Get the list of rules for SQL query optimization from optimization.json

tools.name: explain_plan
tools.description: Send an EXPLAIN PLAN query to Oracle and return the execution plan

tools.name: optimize_sql_with_ai
tools.description: Accept a SQL query and use AI (gpt-4.1) to suggest optimizations based on optimization rules

tools.name: get_proc_rules
tools.description: Get the Pro*C coding rules from proc_rules.md
